string.value: I got a strange book that is frozen. It seems very unusual. Let's go ask #b#p2081200##k.

When I asked #b#p2081200##k about the book, she told me to go see #b#p1032001##k in Ellinia to find out more about it. #b#p1032001##k should know about this book since he/she knows a lot about magic. \n\n#t4161016# #b#c4161016# / 1#k
#b#p1032001##k was astonished by the legend and decided to break the spell that was cast on the book.
What brought you to the Forest of Bishop, magician? I can't answer all your questions, but I can give you some advice. Do you want to ask about the book you have?
Nothing is visible written on it, but I can feel that it has a strong magical aura. Yes... This book has hidden magic. Very strong as well...
Go to see #b#p1032001##k in Ellinia...He's been a elder of magicians for ages. He can help you.
I thought you needed more knowledge. Did I misunderstand you?
All the knowledge about magic is included inside. Try to find anything you want. Huh? Did #b#p2081200##k send you to me? Then there must be something important. Do you want to ask about this book?
Oh! This book definitely has a strong ice element-based magical aura, as if it's trying to get out. Ice magic is hidden in this book!
I'm so happy to see a new magic technique. It's not impossible to unlock the magic hidden in the book...I'll do it for you. Just wait a few moments...
#b#p1032001##k... He's been studying magic for a long time. He should know something!
